subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter scored 21 points to lead the Liberty to a 79-61 victory over the first-place Connecticut Sun in Newark in the teams’ first game after the Olympic break.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter scored 21 points to lead the Liberty to a 79-61 victory over the first-place Connecticut Sun in Newark in the teams’ first game after the Olympic break.
